title: BRIEF-Santos Says Barossa Project Takes Step Towards Final Investment Decision
text:
BRIEF-Santos Says Barossa Project Takes Step Towards Final Investment Decision

Commodities 2 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 11:40)

BRIEF-Santos Says Barossa Project Takes Step Towards Final Investment Decision Sept 26 (Reuters) - Santos Ltd : * BAROSSA PROJECT HAS TAKEN ANOTHER BIG STEP TOWARDS A FINAL INVESTMENT DECISION EARLY NEXT YEAR * SANTOS - CONTRACT FOR ENGINEERING, PROCUREMENT, CONSTRUCTION AND INSTALLATION OF 260-KILOMETRE GAS EXPORT PIPELINE WAS AWARDED TO ALLSEAS GROUP * GAS EXPORT PIPELINE WILL TIE BAROSSA GAS FIELD, 300 KILOMETRES NORTH OF DARWIN, INTO EXISTING BAYU UNDAN TO DARWIN PIPELINE

BRIEF-Santos Says Barossa Project Takes Step Towards Final Investment Decision
description: BRIEF-Santos Says Barossa Project Takes Step Towards Final Investment Decision
